guide.introduction: This is the documentation for a 2008 project, originally developed for The Walled Garden, a conference organized by Virtueel Platform in Amsterdam.
guide.introduction_rendered: This is the documentation for a 2008 project, originally developed for The Walled Garden, a conference organized by Virtueel Platform in Amsterdam.
guide.summary: digital flowers that talk to each other and live or die depending on others.
